d.Name: SAP LeanIX Integration with SAP Business Technology Platform
d.Description:
This integration package is designed to synchronize the SAP Business Technology Platform (SAP BTP) Account Structure (Global and Subaccounts) with SAP LeanIX, automatically creating Platform Factsheets in SAP LeanIX based on SAP BTP best practices for account structuring.

 

Currently, this package includes one integration flow (iFlow), designed to operate independently:

 

  1. Fullsync SAP BTP Account Structure: This integration synchronizes SAP BTP Global Accounts and Subaccounts with SAP LeanIX. It retrieves the account structure from SAP BTP and automatically creates Platform Factsheets in SAP LeanIX based on SAPâ€™s best practices for BTP account structuring. This interface requires manual triggering and operates once per trigger.

Each integration is designed to ensure that your IT integration strategies are supported by the most current and relevant data, fostering informed decision-making and efficient management of IT resources.
d.ShortText: Integrate SAP LeanIX with SAP BTP, e.g., Core Services, to sync your SAP BTP Account Structure with SAP LeanIX.
d.Keywords: SAP Core Services,FactSheets,Platform,Best Practice Modeling SAP BTP
